attributes.action: Lower train fares and stop increasing them.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living crisis makes it extremely hard to travel via public transportation with the prices they are set on. It is prompted that we use public transport to reduce congestion and climate change, yet unfortunately it is almost impossible to do so.
attributes.background: A suggestion may be to reduce adult train fares by a certain amount, or restrict the prices increasing. I simply can no longer afford to travel with public transportation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Do not allow rail fares to be increased
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655238
